name: The First Dungeon Unique PFP In-Game Character
description: The First Dungeon— an open source 2D battle royale game developed by Thijmen Happy. The game is launching through DIGITALAX’s ESPA esports platform mid September. Take your unique character in-game to engage in The First Dungeon casual esports battles, rank on the leaderboard and earn $MONA as you level up from 0 to 1. Also take your little character across the web as an online 2D pixel art identity marker.
